message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think the price is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little. How about $9,500?  This is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $8,800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product, but $8,800 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $9,200? This is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
